Package com.github.gmarcg00.spotify.service

Author:
Guillermo Marcos Garc√≠a

Service for managing tracks

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Track
    getTrack(String id, String token)
    Returns a Track which corresponds with the id
    List<Track>
    getTracks(String[] ids, String token)
    Returns a list of Tracks corresponding to the provided identifiers.

  • Method Details

    • getTrack

      Track getTrack(String id, String token) throws SpotifyApiException
      Returns a Track which corresponds with the id
      Parameters:
      id - track identifier
      token - access token to retrieve Spotify API data
      Returns:
      Track the track requested
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the track is not found
      UnauthorizedException - if token has expired, is invalid or is empty
      BadRequestException - if track identifier has an incorrect format
      RateLimitException - if the app exceeds the rate limit. Spotify's API rate limit is calculated based on the number of calls that your app makes to Spotify in a rolling 30-second window.
      NullPointerException - if id or token are null
      SpotifyApiException

    • getTracks

      List<Track> getTracks(String[] ids, String token) throws SpotifyApiException
      Returns a list of Tracks corresponding to the provided identifiers.
      Parameters:
      ids - an array of track identifiers
      token - access token to retrieve Spotify API data
      Returns:
      a list of Tracks corresponding to the requested identifiers
      Throws:
      UnauthorizedException - if the token has expired, is invalid, or is empty.
      BadRequestException - if a track identifier has an incorrect format.
      RateLimitException - if the app exceeds the rate limit. Spotify's API rate limit is calculated based on the number of calls that your app makes to Spotify in a rolling 30-second window.
      NullPointerException - if ids or token are null.
      SpotifyApiException
